* @param msg Message of the Exception thrown
* Parent class of all the possible DuckieExceptions
* @param message Error message of why the Exception is thrown
* Overrides method to show the message of a DuckieException
* DuckieException thrown when there are insufficient info input
super(INDENT + "Duckie needs more description after the first word.");
* DuckieException thrown when Duckie does not understand the command
super(INDENT + "Sorry, Duckie does not understand what you are trying to do.");
* DuckieException thrown when the input index is not found in the TaskList
super(INDENT + "Quack. The input index is not found in the list.");
* DuckieException thrown when the input command targets a Task but there are no
super(INDENT + "Quack. You have no tasks in the list currently.");
